title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ, which involves opening a new basic project and a file named 'test.xml' using the scripted resource editor example as the default editor, selecting 'test.xml' in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With...' followed by 'Default Text Editor' does not have any effect. The 'test.xml' file remains open in the scripted resource editor example instead of being opened in a new editor window as expected.
EB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing a different default text editor for a file that is already open in a different editor type, the file should be opened in the new editor type in a new editor window.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. Open the 'test.xml' file in the scripted resource editor example.
4. Select the 'test.xml' file in the Navigator.
5. Right-click on the selected file and choose 'Open With...'.
6. From the dropdown menu, select 'Default Text Editor'.
7. Observe that the file remains open in the scripted resource editor example instead of being opened in a new editor window.
